Title: October Lease Auction Qtr-Qtr Section Grid [Michigan] {2017}
Description: The 2017 October Oil and Gas Lease Auction data contains Quarter Quarter Sections related to the lease auction results data table.
Creator: Michigan Department of Natural Resources
